post: I have a DO coupon .But I can not use it . The customer service say like this :  The GitHub Student Developer promo is for students new to DigitalOcean and I see you have been with us for some time. Unfortunately we won't be able to apply this promo to your account. I register DO last month(September 24) . So , I want to transfer this coupon ($100)  to another friend for some dollas. Please PM me . Paid via Paypal .
